message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within my budget?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm open to finding a middle ground. How about $13,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still looking to stay within my budget of $12,000. Would you consider coming down to $12,500?
